## Introduction

esquisse - a Tableau-style drag-and-drop interface for building ggplots.


```{r libraries, hide = FALSE}

pacman::p_load(esquisse, modeldata, tidyverse)

```

## LOAD DATA

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r data}

data("drinks")

data("mpg")


drinks

mpg

```


## USE CASE

The `esquisser()` function fires up the ggplot builder dashboard
Just load the dataset you want to explore
Then drag-and-drop

```{r}


esquisser()


```


Get the ggplot code

Once you are happy with your ggplot, you can get the code used to produce it! - From the Export & code tab on the lower right hand corner
